annotation.description: Defines observable values for the pattern's parameters; the code generator will create accessors for such values to use in databinding contexts.
annotation.name: ObservableValue

annotationparameter.description: The name of the observable value.
annotationparameter.name: name

annotationparameter.description: This expression defines the attribute of a pattern parameter for which the IObservableValue will be created. Only one of the expression and labelExpression properties must be set.
annotationparameter.name: expression

annotationparameter.description: A label expression definition that can contain references to match parameters inside $ symbols. Only one of the expression and labelExpression properties must be set.
annotationparameter.name: labelExpression
